reasoning: Familial hidradenitis suppurativa encompasses genetic forms (NCSTN, POFUT2, POGLUT1, PSEN1, PSEN2 mutations). Familial HS accounts for ~10-40% of HS cases, with estimated incidence 1-3 per 100k/year. Global HS incidence 1-4 per 100k, so familial form ~0.5-2 per 100k. Using 2 per 100k as upper estimate.
source: Hidradenitis Suppurativa epidemiology literature, family studies
